body.para: To return the ATC to standby condition requires the following conditions to be established.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:10px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: ATC shutter close operation requires the following conditions to be established.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:10px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: ATC pot horizontal operation requires the following conditions to be established.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:10px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: To return the ATC arm to home position requires the following conditions to be established.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;
li.text: Spindle Clamp or Unclamp, depending on the current ATC arm position.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;
li.text: Select each item on the ATC Maintenance screen and refer to the maintenance advice to recover the ATC to standby position.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;
li.text: For ATC arm forward and reverse operations refer to the arm angle (zone) display.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;
li.text: To adjust the ATC arm speed, press the
button on the ATC Maintenance screen.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;
li.text: button on the main operation panel to bypass the interlock condition if necessary.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:5px; margin-left:38px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:38px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Take additional care when operating under OT Release mode.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:38px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
